content: **nuki -貫-** features a pattern inspired by nuki joinery a traditional japanese architectural technique it is worked seamlessly from the top down begin working flat then join under the armholes and continue in the round **yarn** urth monokrom dk 100g / 274m / 100% merino wool col 6063 1240m / 450g **needles** 3 6mm / jp5 circular needle 3 3mm / jp4 circular needle 3 0mm / jp3 circular needle **gauge** 24 sts and 30 row = 10cm in st st with 3 6mm/jp5 needle 16 sts and 32 row = 7cm and 10cm in main pattern see page6 with 3 6mm/jp5 needle **size** one size finished body circumference approximately 108cm **technique** german short row
